Featuring Gartner Research
Market Guide for Mobile Application Testing
Thomas E. Murphy | Nick Jones | Joachim Herschmann 03 December 2014
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
With an increasing number of companies embarking on a mobile first strategy, it is obvious that mobile testing has become a dominant topic. Fueled by growth rates of mobile devices and increased customer expectations ('Age of the customer') for speed & quality, a good strategy is needed, in order to maintain customer satisfaction and increased shorter time-to-market for mobile apps.
Testing complexity and costs can quickly escalate when breaking into the mobile market, a high degree of automation is required for success when developing mobile apps. Tricentis Tosca Testsuite provides cutting edge end-to-end testing solutions for mobile apps, cross-OS and cross-devices. By using our model-based test automation approach, mobile app developers are able to achieve automation and risk coverage rates of up to 90% and up.
